content.text:
# 2nd Blue Dragon Series Awards

| site             = Paradise City, Incheon
| host             = Jun Hyun-mooIm Yoon-ah
| holder_label     = Organised by
| holder           = Sports Chosun
| most_wins        = The Glory (2)Big Bet (2)SNL Korea (2)Weak Hero Class 1 (2)Park Jae-chan (2)
| most_nominations = The Glory (5)SNL Korea (5)
| network          = KBS2
| previous         = 1st
| main             = Blue Dragon Series Awards
| next             = 3rd
| website          =
}}
The 2nd Blue Dragon Series Awards () ceremony, organised by Sports Chosun was held on July 19, 2023, at Paradise City, Incheon, at 20:30 KST. It was hosted by Jun Hyun-moo and Im Yoon-ah and broadcast live through KBS2.
The nominees were announced on June 26, 2023. The series which were produced, invested by OTT platforms, and released from May 1, 2022, to May 31, 2023, were eligible for nominations.
With five nominations, The Glory and SNL Korea received the highest number of nominations for drama and variety programs, respectively.
